import React from 'react' import Search from './Search.js' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {Navbar, Nav, Container} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const Header = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { cartItems } = cart return (
문방구
( {cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0)})
) } export default Header
